Sancho, J

metadata.dc:title: Lesión de ambos globos pálidos internos tras una encefalopatía hipóxica secundaria a parada respiratoria por consumo de opiáceos y benzodiacepinas.
[Injury to both internal globus pallidi due to hypoxic encephalopathy as a consequence of respiratory arrest following the consumption of opiates and benzodiazepines].
